definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (life, vid. Di Ge 3:20; > We:Prol. 1886, 322; Skizzen iii. 217 after Nö who suggests serpent as poss. mng., cf. Ar. h.ay=ah;un; but RS:K 177 ‘mother of every ḥayy,’ v. II. [[חַי]] sub [[חיה]])—Ge 3:20 and the man called his wife [[חַוׇּ֑ה]], because she was :[[אֵם כָּל־חָֽי]]; cf. [[אִשְׁתּוֹ]] ´[[ח]] Ge 4:1 (both J).—II. [[חַוׇּה]] village, v. infr. sub II. [[חוה]].
